Reviews.Title: Good camera with excellent night vision
Reviews.Author: Dan Parson
Reviews.Content: I know very little about surveillance cameras. But I need to replace my old cameras. I bought a 480L camera for very cheap price. But its quality is bad. It did not worth to return it since the price is so low. So I decided to buy a better one, and selected this mid-price camera.This camera was too surprise to me, it only take 3 days to my door, in perfect condition. It is very solidly built and performs great. The build-in 36 infrared leds is very bright in the darkness. I totally believe the night vision is clear and bright at greater than 100 feet. This IR camera is a GENUINE night vision camera. I could get CLEAR high resolution monitoring in just start light and street lights. We can see color image in the day time, clear black and white image in the night.And I can zoom this camera to get different view angle as needed.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: the night vision sucks
Reviews.Author: HWEI YING YEN
Reviews.Content: The night vision on this camera really sucks. I compared this camera with the previously installed seventy dollar camera (VideoSecu Color Security Vandal Proof Dome Camera 1/3" Sony CCD 480 TVL 3.6 mm Lens) and the cheaper camera worked far better with better video quality than this camera. I almost couldn't see anything with this camera at dark. I have decided to return this camera, it's not worth the price, go with the cheaper one I mentioned.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD; Color DSP;Automatic CDS sensor;540 TV Lines Horizontal Resolution
0 Lux ( IR LED ON); Signal to Noise Ratio: More than 48dB
Aluminum Housing for outdoor indoor application
IR LED Wave length: 850 nm; Built in 4~9mm Varifocal Manual
Power Requirement: 12V DC Regulated 500mA(sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Built-in 1/3" Sony CCD Dome Security Camera Day Night Vision 540TVL 36 IR Infrared Leds 4-9mm Zoom Focus Lens for Home CCTV DVR Surveillance System 1LE
